report.title: You be the Judge
report.author: Slissbox
report.bodytext: At 4:30 pm this afternoon I was in the same place, doing the same thing I am now -- wasting time fucking around on the internet. I stumbled across nutmeg and did some research. Even though the description said than most of the people that ate nutmeg didn't like it, I found the trip reports to be to the contrary. Having nothing better to do in these dog-days of summer, and recovering from the previous night's excessive consumption of whiskey, I raided the spice cabinet, and found a brand new, 60 gram bottle of ground nutmeg. I ate roughly half the bottle then and there, and hung out for a while. /n /n It is now 2:30 am, I've been feeling the nutmeg for about 2 hours. I find the nutmeg high to be kind of giddy and euphoric, kind of like eating a gram or so of shrooms. I decided to finish off the bottle -- more on that in another 6 or 7 hours. Tomorrow should be interesting. I just found a fairly good-sized roach of some killer indica bud and smoked it all, which equated to about 7 hits, and now, I'm really blazed. There seems to be a nice synergistic effect between the weed and the nutmeg, sadly I don't have anymore but I might smoke some resin later. /n /n So, Ill tell you a little about myself. Im a 20 year old college student/musician, /n And Ive done just about everything, save for the designer chemicals and hard shit like meth and crack. Ive tripped on everything but cactus and PCP. I survived a horrible encounter with datura about a year ago and have since toned down a bit, and no longer mess around with shit like OTCs and sketchy poisonous plants. The nutmeg is a unique experience, especially with being really blazed, but I have to complain of a slight headache. Its really fucking with my short term memory, but I dont mind that. Im gonna smoke a cig and call it a night for now, as its approaching 3 am. At this point in the experience its quite pleasant. /n /n T+24 hours: /n /n I woke up today at about 3:30 pm, since I didnt fall asleep until about 6 of 7 in the morning. All last night my mind was racing. I couldnt stop thinking, which really annoyed me, and my muscles seemed to twitch a lot. This was unpleasant. It is now 4:30pm the day after, and I feel pretty much back to normal, except for the sleep deprivation. /n /n My final analysis is that nutmeg didn't do all that much by itself, the actual buzz was barely noticeable. Smoking some good weed while on nutmeg made it a little more fun. After the weed wore off it was pretty much just a pain in the ass. In the end it reminds me a lot of Benadryl -- a cheap, dirty high that lasts too long and doesnt really do much good.
